About.name: Chris Sampson
About.title: Full Stack Developer
About.bio: Here's a little about me, I am a web developer currently living in New York with a background in Systems Administration and Virtualization. I am both driven and self-motivated and I am always trying new and experimental technologies and methods. I am my worst critic so I am constantly trying to better myself as a developer as I strive to create a better internet for all.
